00028     MfccExtractor::MfccExtractor(unsigned int frameLength,

00049     void MfccExtractor::process(WaveFile* wav, const TransformOptions& options)
00050     {
00051         wavFilename = wav->getFilename();
00052 
00053         unsigned int framesCount = wav->getFramesCount();
00054         featureArray.resize(framesCount);
00055 
00056         if (m_indicator)
00057             m_indicator->start(0, framesCount-1);
00058 
00059         unsigned int N = wav->getSamplesPerFrameZP();
00060         updateFilters(wav->getSampleFrequency(), N);
00061 
00062         spectrumType frameSpectrum(N);
00063         std::vector<double> filtersOutput(MELFILTERS);
00064         std::vector<double> frameMfcc(m_paramsPerFrame);
00065         Transform transform(options);
00066 
00067         // for each frame: FFT -> Mel filtration -> DCT
00068         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < framesCount; ++i)
00069         {
00070             transform.fft(wav->frames[i], frameSpectrum);
00071             filters->applyAll(frameSpectrum, N, filtersOutput);
00072             transform.dct(filtersOutput, frameMfcc);
00073             featureArray[i] = frameMfcc;
00074 
00075             if (m_indicator)
00076                 m_indicator->progress(i);
00077         }
00078 
00079         if (m_indicator)
00080             m_indicator->stop();
00081     }
00082     
00086     void MfccExtractor::setEnabledMelFilters(bool enabled[])
00087     {
00088         delete [] enabledFilters;
00089         enabledFilters = new bool[MELFILTERS];
00090 
00091         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < MELFILTERS; ++i)
00092         {
00093             enabledFilters[i] = enabled[i];
00094         }
00095     }
00096 
00106     void MfccExtractor::updateFilters(unsigned int frequency, unsigned int N)
00107     {
00108         if (!filters)
00109         {
00110             filters = new MelFiltersBank(frequency, 200, N);
00111         }
00112         else
00113         {
00114             if (filters->getSampleFrequency() != frequency ||
00115                 filters->getSpectrumLength() != N)
00116             {
00117                 delete filters;
00118                 filters = new MelFiltersBank(frequency, 200, N);
00119             }
00120         }
00121 
00122         if (enabledFilters)
00123             filters->setEnabledFilters(enabledFilters);
00124     }
00125 }
